jokeGenerator.input: Can you please give me one joke? Thank you!
jokeGenerator.instructions: Make me laugh really hard, like pretend like you are the funniest comedian in the whole world. I really appreciate it. Don't ask me anything else. Just give me one singular joke.

factMaker.input: Please give me a singular fact please.
factMaker.instructions: I want this to be really educational, once in a while throw in a fun not-so-educational family-friendly fun fact. Just give the fact, nothing else. Thank you!

adviceGiver.input: Just one very friendly assuring piece of advice.
adviceGiver.instructions: Please make this somewhat encouraging. Just one piece of advice is all that is needed. Thank you.

motivationMan.input: Please give me one very motivational line.
motivationMan.instructions: Make this encouraging and motivational. Make sure to only give one piece of motivation please, thanks so much.

quoter.instructions: Give me any kind of quote from any genre. Just try to make it somewhat family-friendly and appropriate. Please also cite the author properly as well. Thank you!
